reviewText: I was very pleased with my order.  My order exceeded my expectations.  I enjoyed watching this DVD.  I thought this was a good worship experience.
I use this on our church ladies retreat and all the ladies love it....along with all the other iworship DVDs.
There's nothing wrong with home worship and this DVD is enjoyable to watch. It's also a great worship series to listen to.
Loved it. I would recommend this to anyone who loves Christian music.  I liked that the words could be added or not. We use these at home and at church. Be blessed.
